sentence.Network_en: His hair was disheveled, and his face was unshaven and gray.
sentence.Network_cn: 他头发凌乱，没刮胡子，脸色苍白。

sentence.Network_en: Lovett was a tall, commanding man with a waxed gray mustache.
sentence.Network_cn: 洛维特是个威严的高个男人，蓄着灰白的八字胡。

sentence.Network_en: I saw this nice-looking man in a gray suit.
sentence.Network_cn: 我见到过这个身着灰色套装的英俊男士。
